name: EntrepreneurLiveVideowithToddLIVE
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Todd Bergin aka Todd.LIVE discusses live streaming video insights for entrepreneurs and online creators. As a 30+ year entrepreneur with 20 years of online entrepreneurial endeavors, including business development and branding, marketing, blogging, website development, social media and live video marketing, Todd shares his unique perspective on all things live video and live streaming, including social media tips, tricks, and strategies and all things live video with a healthy dose of Instagram strategies for entrepreneurs.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
